participant_1.background:
I watch my old home videos to feel nostalgic and remember the good times.
I play my guitar to express my feelings.
i design video games for a living.
My dog loves spaghetti and meatballs as much as I do.
I have a secret bank account that I use to buy things that my parents would disapprove of.

participant_2.background:
I take care of my appearance, but I'm not a slave to it.
I don't have any pets because I'm raising my kids on my own.
I live on a farm with my mom who works in telecommunications.
I try to eat healthy foods and exercise regularly because I want to get in better shape for my girlfriend and the baby.
my doctor told me i have six months to live.

content.text: I just moved to a new house with my dog, and I'm looking forward to exploring the neighborhood.
Hey! That sounds exciting. I've lived on a farm with my mom ever since I was a kid.
That's so cool! Do you have any pets?
No, I don't have any pets because I'm raising my kids on my own.
Wow, that's a lot of responsibility! I admire you for taking on that challenge.
Thanks, it's not always easy, but it's the most rewarding thing I've ever done.
I'm sure it is. I can't wait to have kids of my own one day.
Me too! I hope you're able to have a big family.
So, what do you do for a living?
I design video games for a living.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to be a video game designer.
It's a lot of fun, but it can also be challenging.
I'm sure it is. But I think it would be a really rewarding job.
It is. I love being able to create something that people enjoy playing.
That's awesome. I'm glad you enjoy your job.
